content: प्रसन्न {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Pure, clear, bright, limpid, pellucid, transparent; <ls>Ku. 1. 23</ls>; <ls n="Ku.">7. 74</ls>; <ls>Ś. 5. 21.</ls> {@--2@} Pleased, delighted, propitiated, soothed; गंगां शरन्नयति सिंधुपतिं प्रसन्नां <ls>Mu. 3. 9</ls>; गंभीरायाः पयसि सरितश्चेतसीव प्रसन्ने <ls>Me. 40</ls> (where the first sense is also intended); <ls>Ku. 5. 35</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 68.</ls> {@--3@} Kind, kindly disposed, gracious, propitious; अवेहि मां कामदुघां प्रसन्नां <ls>R. 2. 63.</ls> {@--4@} Plain, open, clear, easily intelligible (as meaning). {@--5@} True, correct; प्रसन्नस्ते तर्कः <ls>V. 2</ls>; प्रसन्नप्रायस्ते तर्कः <ls>Māl. 1.</ls> {@--6@} Settled down, tranquil. --न्ना {@--1@} Propitiation, pleasing. {@--2@} Spirituous liquor.
